# Introduction


## Motivation

This course aims to provide motivations for learning computational skills and discuss specific examples or ways computational skills could benefit or supplement wet lab work.

## Target Audience  

The course is intended for wet lab researchers who have very little to no computational experience (for example: users of Excel or GraphPad Prism, but non-"coders")
